Summary: We present rCGH, a comprehensive array-based comparative genomic hybridization analysis workflow, integrating computational improvements and functionalities specifically designed for precision medicine. rCGH supports the major microarray platforms, ensures a full traceability and facilitates profiles interpretation and decision-making through sharable interactive visualizations.
publication.title: RCGH: A comprehensive array-based genomic profile platform for precision medicine

summary.description: A comprehensive pipeline for analyzing and interactively visualizing genomic profiles generated through commercial or custom aCGH arrays. This package takes all the steps required for individual genomic profiles analysis, from reading files to profiles segmentation and gene annotations. It also provides several visualization functions which facilitate individual profiles interpretation.
summary.name: rCGH
